commit message: Replaced local libraries by maven.org libraries
OSMBonusPack now as lib instead project. AppRateDialog removed from free version.

Step detection uses global vertical acceleration.

Step detection previously checked acceleration in the z axis of the device's frame of reference (into and out of the screen). This did not accurately detect steps when the device was held in orientations other than parallel to the ground. Step detection now checks acceleration in the global z axis frame of reference (into and out of the center of the Earth).

Merge pull request #3 from Dritte/patch-1

Step detection uses global vertical acceleration.

Merge pull request #6 from naofum/master

Added Japanese translation
